# EnumerableExtensions.ToDataTable&lt;T&gt; method

Creates a new datatable from an IEnumerable.

```csharp
public static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(this IEnumerable items, string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Enumerable data type |
| items | Target items. |
| name | Table name. |

## Return Value

DataTable which contains the specified rows.
